This function reveals if an element is low LOD.

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool isElementLowLOD ( element theElement )
</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP||[[/element.md|element]]:isLowLOD||}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theElement:''' The [[/element.md|element]] whose low LOD status we want to get.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the element is low LOD, ''false'' otherwise.
